amendment.description: To set aside funds for the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children.

action.text: Amendment SA 3585, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3585 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3585 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text as modified: CR S5503) To set aside funds for the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3585 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3585 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
